definition: to mix/to mix in/to toss (a salad)
"hand" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 64), occurring in 提, 把, 打 etc
half/semi-/incomplete/(after a number) and a half
salad with dressing/cold vegetables dressed with sauce (e.g. coleslaw)
noodles served with soy sauce/sesame butter etc
erhua variant of 雜拌|杂拌[za2 ban4]

sentences.english: Add balsam pear, saute with medium heat until done, serve.
sentences.chinese: 最後加入苦瓜，以中火再炒拌至所有材料熟透即可。

sentences.english: The mixed cement has been hoisted up the building.
sentences.chinese: 拌好的水泥灰漿已吊到建築物頂上了。

sentences.english: Modified effect was studied on fresh mortar and hardens mortar with bentonite.
sentences.chinese: 研究了膨潤土對新拌砂漿和硬化砂漿的改性效果。

sentences.english: Remove from heat and stir in the flour, baking soda, and almonds until well mixed.
sentences.chinese: 離火拌入麪粉，蘇打粉，還有杏仁片，混合均勻。

sentences.english: Next, stir in the beaten eggs.
sentences.chinese: 下一步把打好的雞蛋拌進去。

sentences.english: Add in coconut shreds and hazelnut powder.
sentences.chinese: 加入椰絲和榛子粉，用橡膠刮刀撈拌均勻。

sentences.english: Pour the sauce over the tomatoes and beans. Toss the salad well and serve.
sentences.chinese: 把醬潑在西紅柿和菜豆上，拌一拌就可以享用了。

sentences.english: Heat oil, stir-fry prawns for 1 min.
sentences.chinese: 用熱油將蝦拌炒約1分鐘。

sentences.english: Add rice, stir until coated and grains start to burst.
sentences.chinese: 加入米飯，拌炒至米粒脫皮及開始焦黃。

sentences.english: The utility model still uses the base structure that a threshing wheel drum and a shed cover are installed on a threshing stirring barrel.
sentences.chinese: 沿用在打穀拌桶上裝打穀輪鼓及棚蓋的基本結構。

sentences.english: Remove from heat, then stir in flour, gradually pour in milk and cook until thickened.
sentences.chinese: 離火拌入麪粉，徐徐倒入鮮奶，回爐煮至濃稠。

sentences.english: Fried after the completion of the wind cooling drain oil after entering automatic mixing materials machine.
sentences.chinese: 油炸完畢後風吹瀝油冷卻後進入自動拌料機。

sentences.english: They can also be steamed and served on watercress with a plum sauce.
sentences.chinese: 它們也可以蒸，和着西洋菜拌上蘇梅醬一起食用。

sentences.english: Duck gizzards with spicy peanuts was Sichuan-inspired.
sentences.chinese: 鴨胗拌香辣花生頗具四川風味。

sentences.english: Cut the fish fillets into 4cm chunks and add in marinade for about 1 hour.
sentences.chinese: 將魚肉批片，切成長4釐米塊狀，加醃料拌漬1小時。
